project1-d1: In the service of engineering cycle training.
project1-d2: To bring together headhunters, professionals in the field of information technology with "Computer Engineering" expected to graduate students, in order to contribute to their integration in internship and employment. The meeting is held in December of each academic year (end of the fifth semester), Faculty FST Settat.

project10-d2: Presentation of the project before the Dean (made public in December 2017), piloting the launch of the strategic plan (simulation).

Date of implementation: Training cycle 2010/2012. Results communicated between 2013 and 2015.
